TopicTitle: Plain old ferrings, not proceduraly generated btw!

Articles.Content: I tried to make the Saturn V rocket with the new parts from 0.23.5. It was so close. Just there were no ferrings to put the lander for apollo 11 replica in. All I ask for are ferrings that come as a part and aren't proceduraly generated. That would do me and many others a world of good. If this conflicts with the 'don't post' thread, please take it down. I wasn't sure if the rule about not posting proceduraly generated ferrings would still count with non proceeduraly generated ferrings. Thanks again. One-Way Gaming.
*Fairings, and KW Rocketry has some fixed size ones.

thanks. I think I'll ask him if he's able to release a fairings pack and leave the rest of the parts out. It's an awesome mod, but all I want now are fairings. Like what the developer of the FASA Pack did. He released a pack only containing his launch towers and nothing else.
You could download the whole pack and delete everything but the fairings.

The Mod with the Gemini and Mercury Capsules (dont remember the name right now) has an dedicated Lander Compartment with an inline docking Point inside the fairings

Greetings

Ben

The Mod with the Gemini and Mercury Capsules (dont remember the name right now) has an dedicated Lander Compartment with an inline docking Point inside the fairings

Greetings

Ben

Thats called FASA. The developer released a pack full of his launch towers as well.
Stock fairings would be great, though I prefer them to be procedural. Exactly as the mod 'procedural fairings'.

Farrings will probable come in the stock game when the Devs focus on arodynamics. Until they do there isn't any poin gameplay wise for ferrings. They look nice, but as said above there's mods that do it already and they look great
